ART UPDATE

You are going to update the ART (Atheros Radio Test) on the device.
Please, choose a file from your local hard drive and click the Update ART button.

WARNINGS
  • Do not power off the device during the update.
  • If everything goes well, the device will restart automatically.
  • You can upload any file, so ensure you choose the proper ART image for your device.
Version: 24.05.19
